content: the magnolia sweetheart top is a raglan style crochet crop top with short sleeves and a sweetheart neckline this design features a centre front tie detail that uses a crochet chain to create a ruched sweetheart neckline since this top is worked from the top down you can try it on as you go to find the perfect fit it doesn t need to be a crop top you add or remove as many row as you want so you can easily make a full length tee too slightly_smiling_face this top uses cotton yarn to create an elegant and modern summer crochet top this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
